hero.description: Capturing genuine moments of children, families, and friends in Mauritius—creating meaningful, heartfelt memories that you'll cherish for years to come.

about.description1: Lion Kidz Photography is a photographer in Royal Road, Malakoff, Mauritius. I specialize in taking pictures of landscapes, nature, and portraits.
about.description2: It all started in 2019 when I began snapping photos with my cell phone. Since then, I've worked hard to get better by researching, editing, and watching tutorials.
about.description3: What sets Lion Kidz Photography apart is my passion, patience, and creativity.

servicesPage.title: Photography
servicesPage.description: Choose from our carefully crafted photography packages designed to capture your most precious moments. Each service includes professional editing and digital delivery.

addOns.title: Optional
addOns.description: Enhance your photography experience with these additional services.

booking.question: How far in advance should I book?
booking.answer: We recommend booking your session 2–4 weeks in advance, especially during peak seasons and holidays, to ensure your preferred date and time. However, we understand that plans can change or special moments come up unexpectedly. If you need a last-minute booking, please don't hesitate to contact us—we'll do our best to fit you in whenever possible.

weather.question: What happens if it rains during our outdoor session?
weather.answer: Mauritius weather can be unpredictable! We monitor weather closely and will reschedule if needed at no extra cost.

delivery.question: How long until I receive my photos?
delivery.answer: Standard delivery is 7-10 business days. Rush delivery (24-48 hours) is available for an additional fee.

rawPhotos.question: Do you provide the raw/unedited photos?
rawPhotos.answer: We provide professionally edited high-resolution images. Raw files are not included in our standard packages.

aboutPage.title: About
aboutPage.description: Lion Kidz Photography is based in Royal Road, Malakoff, Mauritius, offering a unique blend of landscape, nature, and portrait photography.

story.title: Our
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2019, the journey began with a simple cell phone and a deep curiosity about capturing the world's beauty. Since those early days, I have dedicated myself to mastering the craft—constantly learning through research, hands-on editing, and exploring new techniques via tutorials.
story.paragraph2: What truly sets Lion Kidz Photography apart is a commitment to Passion: Every session is approached with genuine enthusiasm and a love for storytelling through images.
story.paragraph3: Patience: I take the time to understand each client's vision, ensuring every detail is thoughtfully captured. Creativity: Each project is an opportunity to craft something distinctive, blending artistic vision with technical skill.
story.paragraph4: Whether you're seeking breathtaking landscapes, vibrant nature shots, or timeless portraits, Lion Kidz Photography strives to deliver images that are both memorable and meaningful.

info.title: Contact
info.hoursDetails: 9-5 Monday to Friday to arrange bookings

guarantee.title: Business Hours
guarantee.description: Monday to Saturday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM (Mauritius Time). We're closed on Sundays and public holidays.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.description: Quick answers to help you get started.

booking.question: How do I book a session?
booking.answer: Simply fill out the contact form above or call/WhatsApp us directly. We'll discuss your needs and schedule your session.

clothing.question: What should we wear?
clothing.answer: We provide a detailed styling guide after booking, with color coordination tips and outfit suggestions for the whole family.

travel.question: Do you travel for sessions?
travel.answer: Yes! We travel throughout Mauritius. Additional travel fees may apply for locations outside the Grand Port area.

cancellation.question: What's your cancellation policy?
cancellation.answer: We understand life happens! You can reschedule up to 48 hours before your session at no charge.
